content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) is connected to a burner inserter at position(x=39.5 y=-79.5)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) is connected to a burner inserter at position(x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of an offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), a boiler at position(x=111.5 y=-32.0), and a steam engine at position(x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- The offshore pump is connected to a pipe group at position(x=107.5 y=-34.5) and another pipe group at position(x=105.5 y=-32.5)
- The pipe groups are connected to the boiler
- The boiler is connected to the steam engine

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a belt group at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5) and two transport belts at positions(x=63.5 y=-53.5) and (x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner mining drills
- Ensure that the burner mining drills have fuel before attempting to mine
- Ensure that the stone furnaces connected to the burner mining drills have ingredients before attempting to smelt

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure that the offshore pumps are connected to a pipe group before attempting to pump fluid

### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure that the boilers have fuel before attempting to heat up the steam engine
- Ensure that the boilers are connected to a pipe group before attempting to heat up the steam engine

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure that the steam engines are connected to a pipe group before attempting to generate electricity
- Ensure that the steam engines are plugged into an electric network before attempting to generate electricity

### Errors when using transport belts
- Ensure that the transport belts are connected to a belt group before attempting to transport items
- Ensure that the transport belts are not empty before attempting to transport items

# NAMESPACE
### Utility functions
- `get_entity_position(entity)`: Returns the position of an entity
- `get_entity_status(entity)`: Returns the status of an entity
- `connect_entities(entity1, entity2)`: Connects two entities together

### Important variables
- `entity_list`: A list of all entities on the map
- `entity_positions`: A dictionary of entity positions
- `entity_statuses`: A dictionary of entity statuses
- `pipe_group_connections`: A dictionary of pipe group connections
- `belt_group_connections`: A dictionary of belt group connections
